description: Speaking at an event to mark Civil Services Day, PM Narendra Modi today said, “The push for reform comes from political leadership but the perform angle is determined by officers and Jan Bhagi
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
At the core of the ‘Reform, Perform and Transform’ agenda are the political leadership, civil servants & public participation. 

Political will gives the impetus for reform & civil services set the tone to perform. And the power of Jan Bhagidari transforms. http://nm-4.com/4br4
